roleset.name: sell some commodity at a lower price than the competition

example.name: the one example
example.text: But instead of a new customer -- part of a hoped-for bonanza from [*] underselling Sony -- Justin got a costly legal morass.

roleset.name: sell less of something, withold sales of a good

example.name: With purpose: heightening demand
example.text: At the end of November, relevant state authorities undersold temporary grain reserves twice consecutively in a seven day period in order to increase the supply in the raw grain market and meet enterprises' demand for grain.
example.arg: twice consecutively in a seven day period
in order to increase the supply in the raw grain market and meet enterprises' demand for grain.
